titulo: AI-assisted digital aircraft design, manufacturing and MRO, towards a competitive aviation
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes:AI-assisted digital aircraft design, redesign and certification â€“ in collaboration with existing or improved digital twins and virtual products.AI-assisted design tools for aircraft requirement definition, validation and verification, to improve efficiency of the system design activities.AI-assisted digital (i) aircraft manufacturing, (ii) aircraft operation, condition monitoring and prediction,
